extends java.lang.Object
    Class to hold the currently active user type.

    Jeroen Van Der Donckt, Alexander Braekevelt

        Sets the active user type to the given user type.
        Parameters:
        s - the name of the user type to change to.
        Postcondition:
        the user type will be set to the given user type.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the user type does not exist.

        Add first user to an XmlObject.
        Parameters:

        Postcondition:

        Parameters:

        Postcondition:
